arStrings.szText: If an enemy hit by {c_important}Reap{/c} dies within {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} seconds, you gain {c_number}[{SF_5} * 100|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed for {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Reap{/c} forms a Corpse under the first enemy hit. Can only occur every {c_number}{buffduration:GENERATE_CORPSE_ICD}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Reap{/c} instantly kills enemies below {c_number}[{SF_7}*100|%|]{/c} Life. This does not work on Bosses or Players.
